sentence: Friedman wrote a piece extensively focused on Israeli politics and the "most diverse national unity government in Israel's history," something he suggested, "might be a harbinger for politics in the U.S." NYT COLUMNIST DOUBLES DOWN ON DEFENDING RANDI WEINGARTEN AS A CHAMPION OF KEEPING SCHOOLS OPEN "Is that what America needs in 2024 a ticket of Joe Biden and Liz Cheney?"
title: Biden-Cheney? Twitter melts down over NYT columnist's proposed 2024 ticket
